description:
Xam.PCL Settings provides a consistent, cross platform settings plugin for Windows Phone  Silverlight 8/8.1, Windows Phone 8.1, Windows Store, Xamarin.iOS, and Xamarin.Android when using a PCL or any project and is Xamarin.Forms and MvvmCross compatible.  This makes it easier to create cross-platform .NET apps and have cross platform settings. Manage and use all settings from one PCL and save natively on each platform. *This plugin stores settings natively on each platform and does NOT save them to Json. This allows you to use native functionality such as PreferenceActivity on Android.

         Support for: Int, Int64, Double, String, DateTime, Bool, Float, Decimal, Guid
         
         You can always serialize and deserialize a string out if needed.
         
         2.0.0-alpha- Final Unified Support + Ability to remove a key.
         1.4.0.1- Add iOS Unified (64 bit), Fix Doubles on Android.
         1.3.0.0- Add Windows Phone 8.1 Support with new PCL profile
releaseNotes:
Breaking Change: On Android all Doubles & Decimals have been updated to correctly parse from strings. This will break apps and you will need to remove your setting first if you are using doubles or decimals. I am sorry, but this is now future proof.

Added Features: 
1.) Ability to remove a setting
2.) Generic AddOrUpdate for future proofing
3.) Fixes for doubles and decimals
summary: Cross platform settings for Windows Phone Silverlight 8/8.1, Windows Phone 8.1, Windows Store, Xamarin.Android and Xamarin.iOS with a PCL or in a base project. This is also Xamarin.Forms compatible as well!
title: Settings Plugin for Xamarin and Windows
